metadata.title: CVE-2021-44854 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in MediaWiki before 1.35.5, 1.36.x before 1.36.3,and 1.37.x before 1.37.1. The REST API publicly caches results from privatewikis.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
